Class Space

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.World
      Space

public class Space
extends greenfoot.World

This is World Space, where the game will take place. It features a moving background and populates the world, while keeping track of the score. The first four static variables set up the moving background, which I modified based on code I found online. Counter sets up the scorekeeper, while diff life and modify life set up the difficulty and life counters.

Author:
(Eden Zik)

Field Summary
static int diff
          diff increases at random times and makes enemies more frequent
static int life
          life is a static variable with the initial number of lives
static boolean modifyLife
          modify life can be affected by objects when the number of lives has been changed

Constructor Detail

Space

public Space()
The Space() method sets up the initial variables for the world. Super sets up world size. setSpeed sets up the speed of the game. Several background variables set up the background moving Populate() sets up the initial population, spaceship included.

Method Detail

act

public void act()
act() is a method which continously executes throughout the game. Besides scrolling, it also introudces several elements into the game at random, all depending on the value of diff (the difficulty).
